Potion of Might

The Potion of Might is a type of potion in Remixed Dungeon that permanently increases the drinker's strength and maximum health.

Effects

When consumed, the Potion of Might provides:

  • +1 permanent strength
  • +5 permanent hit points (maximum health)

Acquisition

The Potion of Might can be found in:

  • Chests in the dungeon
  • Shops (rarely available)
  • As a rare drop from certain enemies
  • In Treasury levels

Strategy

  • Best consumed early in the game when additional strength is most beneficial
  • Provides a permanent boost to carrying capacity and melee damage
  • The extra health is immediately applied to current health, making it safe to consume even at low health
  • Only one Potion of Might exists per game, so timing its consumption is important

Code Reference

  • Implementation: PotionOfMight.java
  • String Resources: PotionOfMight strings
  • Configuration: Treasury.json example

Related

  • Potions - Other types of potions
  • Strength - The attribute increased by this potion
  • Potion of Strength - Similar potion available in other variants
